participant_1.background:
I love to eat pita bread with hummus.
I am bipolar.
I am a mother of three.
I am thinking of becoming a mother next year.
I go to work early in the morning as a nurse.

participant_2.background:
My left knee is filled with metal.
My family means the world to me.
I enjoy jazz music from when i was a girl.
I play bingo every wednesday with my husband.

content.text: Hi! I'm (name).
Hello (name), my name is (name). It's nice to meet you!
Nice to meet you too! What do you do for fun?
I like to play bingo with my husband every Wednesday. I also enjoy listening to jazz music.
That sounds fun! I love to play bingo too. I also love to eat pita bread with hummus.
That's a great combination! I've never tried it, but I'm sure it's delicious.
It is! You should try it sometime.
I will! What else do you like to do for fun?
I like to go to the park with my kids. We like to play on the swings and the slide.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I don't have any kids, but I like to watch them play.
They're a lot of work, but they're also a lot of fun.
I can imagine. Do you have any other hobbies?
I used to be a nurse, but I had to quit because of my bipolar disorder.
I'm sorry to hear that. I'm sure you were a great nurse.
Thank you. I miss it sometimes, but I'm happy to be home with my family.
I'm sure they're glad to have you home too.
Yes, they are.
So, what do you like to do when you're not working or with your family?
I like to read, watch TV, and go online.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I like to do similar things. I also like to go shopping and spend time with my friends.
That sounds fun! I don't have many friends, but I'm trying to make more.
I'm sure you'll make some great friends! You seem like a nice person.
Thank you! I think you're nice too.
